custom-action.name: publish
custom-action.description:
Publish a message to an MQTT broker.
Possible parameters are: - BrokerAlias (optional): Alias identifying the broker.Assumes and requires that, for the current User Path, a connection (using the ConnectAction) has been established and associated to the specified BrokerAlias. If User Path connects to one broker only, this parameter can be left out. - Topic (optional): The name of the topic on which to publish the message. - Message (required): Content of the message to publish. - QoS (optional): A Quality of Service Level (QoS) for this message, the level (0,1 or 2) determines the level of guarantee of a message reaching the other end. Default value is "0".
